error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
  Type '{ Origin: any }' has no construct signatures.
simple.ts(2,31): error TS2449: Class 'A' used before its declaration.


!!! error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
!!! error TS2351:   Type '{ Origin: any }' has no construct signatures.
==== module.ts (0 errors) ====
    module X.Y {
        export module Point {
            export var Origin = new Point(0, 0);
        }
    }
    
==== classPoint.ts (0 errors) ====
    module X.Y {
        // duplicate identifier
        export class Point {
            constructor(x: number, y: number) {
                this.x = x;
                this.y = y;
            }
            x: number;
            y: number;
        }
    }
    
==== simple.ts (1 errors) ====
    module A {
        export var Instance = new A();
                                  ~
!!! error TS2449: Class 'A' used before its declaration.
!!! related TS2728 simple.ts:6:7: 'A' is declared here.
    }
    
    // duplicate identifier
    class A {
        id: string;
    }
